overview:
Paul McLintock is currently the Founder and Managing Director of Spa and Leisure Jobs (www.spaandleisurejobs.co.uk), a leading job board dedicated to the leisure and spa market, UK and Worldwide markets. Working with a number of global clients, Spa and Leisure Jobs is fast becoming the website of choice for companies looking to attract the best candidates from across the sector.

Prior to Spa and Leisure Jobs, Paul was the Founder of Chikara Solutions / LSR (Leisure and Spa Recruitment) a dedicated senior management recruitment consultancy within the leisure and hospitality sector. Paul was responsible for filling a number of top vacancies around the World for a number of leading international chains.
